mapper.sql: ID, NAME, TYPE, ADDRESS, PID, PHONE, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, TABSPACE, MEMO, LEVEL, SEQUENCE, OPERATOR, OPERATE_IP, OPERATE_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into ORGAN_MINE (ID, NAME, TYPE, ADDRESS, PID, PHONE, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, TABSPACE, MEMO, LEVEL, SEQUENCE, OPERATOR, OPERATE_IP, OPERATE_TIME ) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tabspace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sequence,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update ORGAN_MINE
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PID = #{pid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LONGITUDE = #{longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LATITUDE = #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TABSPACE = #{tabspace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEQUENCE = #{sequence,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATE_IP = #{operateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATE_TIME = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update ORGAN_MINE set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PID = #{pid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LONGITUDE = #{longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LATITUDE = #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TABSPACE = #{tabspace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEQUENCE = #{sequence,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATE_IP = #{operateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATE_TIME = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: SELECT "ID" || ',' || "NAME" FROM ORGAN_MINE WHERE "NAME" LIKE concat(#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
